name: Goalz .
description:
Swipe to avoid defenders and score as many goals as possible in this incredible soccer game!

Goalz is an addictive, easy and infinite soccer game. Swipe left or right to move your ball and sneak between defenders to score as many goals as possible. Time is limited, so hurry up!

Score goals without touching opposite players to increase your bonus and win more points for each goal.
Don't forget to grab stars on the field to unlock dozens of collectible balls.

Goalz is the soccer game that will help you to wait until the 2018 World Cup in Russia. Try it for FREE!

Challenge your friends and beat their high scores! Who will be the best striker of you?

Game features:
◉ Free
◉ Easy gameplay (swipe)
◉ Endless gameplay
◉ Collectible balls
◉ Offline friendly

Crafted with love under the sun of Montpellier and the freshness of French Alps by Pixel Rocket game studio.
